backend/main.mo: Actor canister handling user profiles and per-user progress with role-based access control and storage in in‑memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregated feature evidence mapping implemented features to related files, components, and requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining a warm OKLCH color palette, theme variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level component managing navigation between pages and showing the profile setup modal when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, auth button, bottom navigation, and page content container.
frontend/src/components/AuthGateNotice.t: Alert explaining unsaved progress for guests with a login button tied to Internet Identity.
Interactive flashcard viewer with reveal, shuffle, navigation, and progress recording.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter a name and save their profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/QuizPlayer.tsx: Runs a generated quiz for a topic, tracks answers and score, updates progress, and shows a summary when complete.
frontend/src/components/QuizSummary.tsx: Displays quiz results with score, messages, and a button to return to topics.
frontend/src/components/TopicPicker.tsx: Renders selectable topic cards with icons and names, calling onSelect when chosen.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/useProgress.ts: Manages local and backend-synced progress for topics, updating scores and flashcard views.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query wrappers for fetching and saving user profiles and progress via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, warm color utilities, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/learningContent.ts: Provides flashcard content for alphabet, numbers, colors, and shapes, plus a helper to fetch topic-specific items.
frontend/src/lib/progressTypes.ts: Defines progress-tracking interfaces and a factory for initializing empty progress.
frontend/src/lib/quizEngine.ts: Generates quizzes by selecting random flashcards, adding distractors, and formatting topic-specific questions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page displaying hero image, welcome message, and navigation cards for learning, quizzes, and progress.
frontend/src/pages/LearnPage.tsx: Allows users to pick a topic and view flashcards for that topic.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Shows per‑topic learning stats and user-specific progress, with optional auth gating.
frontend/src/pages/QuizPage.tsx: Allows users to choose a topic and take a quiz using the selected content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state metadata, required images, existing features, and pending feature requests for a kids learning app.
